product_name: Leki Jannu Aergon SpeedLock Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: These Jannu Aergon SpeedLock women's trekking poles reduce stress on your knees by supporting and stabilizing you on the trail. Lightweight, rubber composite grips offer a secure hold. Positive Angle grips position the hands at an ergonomically correct angle for optimal swing efficiency and stress relief at wrists. Use of aluminum alloy allows thin shaft walls, providing a 20% reduction in swing weight without loss of strength. Simple and fast, SpeedLock external locking system adjustment requires little effort to securely lock pole sections into position. 3-section telescoping poles extend from 25.5 - 49.25 in. Baskets provide extra support on soft terrain. Scratch-resistant surfaces and high polish lacquering protect your Leki Jannu trekking poles from abrasion. Durable carbide tip ends optimize grip on ice and rocks.
short_description: These Jannu Aergon SpeedLock women's trekking poles reduce stress on your knees by supporting and stabilizing you on the trail.
